transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji sir aapne phone lagaya tha. Bataiye kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi aa rahi bilkul bhi aa rahi hai kal to.
Executive: Lead hi nahi aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jaise aap search kar rahe hain to aa rahi hai kya?
Customer: Search kar rahe hain tab bhi nahi aa rahi hai marble murti wali sir.
Executive: Achha marble murti ki aapko nahi aa rahi hai ek bhi lead?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ye sir PL Ganesha ye sab mein aap bechte hain na?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Lord Buddha statue, monk ye Ganesh statue. Ye sir aayi to hai aapko leads Ganesh statue ki bhi hai. Buddha statue ki bhi hai sare.
Customer: Mere phone mein nahi hai. Mere paas nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Achha aapke system mein aa rahi hai. Abhi aap free hai? Abhi aap free hai? Main aapko link mein join karwa deta hu. Yaha pe main dikha deta hu aur WhatsApp pe main share kar deta hu aapko leads tabhi aap consume kar payenge.
Customer: Thik hai aap ek baar WhatsApp pe share kar do kaun si file in daalni hai.
Executive: Thik hai main usko ek baar khol ke. Haan.
Executive: Jaise ki main aapse ye puch raha tha ke leads aapko kis cheez ki chahiye thi marble statue ki?
Customer: Haan aapko product ke bare mein mere mein pata hai na?
Executive: Nahi nahi mujhe to aapke haan sab mujhe pata hai.
Customer: Haan to bhai sahab aap usko wo tag aur usko add mat karo isme.
Executive: Marble murti ki. Suno jo isme hai na Ganesh agar aapne isme likha hoga to Ganesh rahega. Thik hai?
Executive: Panchmukhi Hanuman ji Ganesh. Nahi aap jaise bata dijiye Ganesh ji ki ye jo aa rahi hai to aap consume karenge ye wali karenge aap lead?
Customer: Karenge kyun nahi Ganesh ji ki. Kyunki isme 1.2 feet marble Ganesh statue ki hai to aapka add hai product.
Customer: Haan na.
Executive: Haan to main main to. Haan to main aapko sir bhejne ke liye ya fir main aapko agar aap do panch minute free ho to main link hi aapko send kar deta hu to yaha pe aap join kar lijiye.
Customer: Free to main hu bas main to main to Delhi ja raha hu aaj.
Executive: Achha aap Delhi ja rahe hain. To abhi bus mein honge to aap baithe ho to aaram se join kar sakte hain. IndiaMART to nahi karega to.
Customer: Nahi pata hai na IndiaMART to nahi karega to.
Executive: Kaisa?
Customer: Online to kaam karna padega na IndiaMART nahi karega to kya kare ab.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir IndiaMART aapke sath barabar se. Are nahi karna.
Customer: Barabar se main inme fas gaya.
Executive: Sir aap bar bar yahi kehte hain ki main fas gaya lekin aap bhi to dekhiye aap by lead consume kar to rahe hain. Jaise ki abhi aap nahi aa rahi hai to aap mujhe WhatsApp pe connect kar lijiye call kar lijiye main aapko de dunga jaise calls bhi aapke paas abhi aaye the aapne ek bhi call bhi attend nahi kare the buyers ke. 15 tarikh ki date aapki. Bata raha hu Narendra Kumar Sharma ji se aapki baat hui hogi ya inhone inquiry dali hogi to aapne inko reply bhi nahi kiya marble statue ke liye. Inhone aapko di hai ek rating 15 tarikh ko 15 November abhi panch din pehle hi.
Customer: 15 November. Aapki rating bhi kam ho gayi hai. Haan ji sir.
Executive: Ye hai Bharatpur. Bharatpur se aayi hogi koi lead ya sir aapko inquiry aayi hogi Narendra Kumar Sharma ji. Marble statue ke liye.
Customer: Isme aa gaya ye mere mein to aa hi nahi raha.
Executive: Aap inquiry kholiye and dekhiye. Are inquiry to khol raha hu aur kya kar raha hu main.
Executive: IndiaMART ka aapne app khola lead manager open kiya inquiry open kiya to waha pe aa rahi hogi.
Customer: Ye aa raha hai Naveen Jaipur Murti. Iski keh rahe ho na aap?
Executive: Kiski bol rahe hain sir aap?
Customer: Ye Bharatpur se jo. Bilkul bilkul usi ki keh raha hu main.
Customer: Yaar ye bhai sahab murti wala khud hai ye. Aapne to keh diya ye. Acha murti wale khud hai. To aur kya meri isse khud se baat hui hai. To mere hi keh raha tha ki aap aapke senior se kya bol raha tha main account manager change kar do aap. Isliye keh raha tha isliye keh raha tha. Sir ye khud murti wala ye khud hai mere se wo keh raha hai bhai sahab mere painting karne aa jana. To main kyun aa tere painting karne ke liye.
Executive: Achha to isne aapko isliye usne aapko lead di.
Executive: Main yaha se aapka dekh le raha hu by lead aapke liye bhej de raha hu WhatsApp pe agar aap ho to main abhi video link bhej deta hu to aap video link ek baar check kar lijiye by lead main aapko sari show karwa deta hu ki yaha pe kaun si aapki relevant hai jo bhi aap bolenge ye wali sir aap mujhe bhej dijiye to main aapko share kar deta hu. Bataiye sir kar du main link send kar du aapko?
Customer: Thik hai agar aapke jaise jaise theek ho kar lo.
Executive: Nahi nahi jaise main ye keh raha tha na main aapko link provide kar deta hu aap usko join kar lijiye thik hai yaha se main by lead aapko sari dikha deta hu jo jo aap bolenge yaha se main turant main aapko share karta jaunga on call. Itni to wo jyada best rahega. Suno main aapko itni baar bola tha jo local lead hai na wo band kar do aap Bharatpur Rajasthan Alwar Jaipur lekin aap abhi bhi ye mere paas aati hai. Thik hai? Ye proper band hi karni hai aapne isko wo kiya tha wo dustbin wala jo sign ban ke aata hai not relevant wo kiya tha aapne waha pe? Jo maine aapko last time bataya tha ki aapko lead nahi chahiye not relevant pe saat options aate hain. To aapne mark nahi kiya tha sir uska?
Customer: Kiya to tha.
Executive: Sir aapka mark mujhe nahi dikh raha kya hai ki aap jab mark karenge na tabhi waha se leads nahi aayegi ek baar main aapko fir se guide kar dunga koi issue nahi hai mujhe agar aap bolte hain ki sir fir bhi aa rahi hai to hum check kar lenge. Jaise abhi main dekh leta hu ki aapne kaun kaun si cities chal rahi hai aapki jo aap le rahe hain dekhiye new Delhi ki aapne 10 by lead uthai hai Delhi ki aath uthai hai che Mumbai ki li hai Pune ki li hai panch Aligarh ki char Bharatpur ki char. Top 10 mein aapne Alwar ki li hai teen Amritsar ki li hai do Ludhiana ki teen.
Customer: Bhai sahab Alwar ka mujhe kya karna hai ye batao na Alwar to mera khud ka jila hai.
Executive: Bilkul lekin aapne teen consume kari hai by lead. Ab kya sir wo to ye to batao aap. Sir wahi to maine aapko bataya tha na last time aapke hamari baat hui thi to humne aapse kya bola tha ki not relevant pe jab aap mark karenge na to waha pe ek aa jayega likh ke. Maine saat options bhi aapko dikhaye the. Main ek baar aur dikha deta hu koi issue nahi hai aap agar waha pe mark karenge na tab waha se lead nahi aayegi.
Customer: Aapki taraf se band nahi hoga kya ye?
Executive: Nahi sir meri aapki taraf se hi band hoga jab aap usko select karenge na tabhi band hoga. Ye AI based hai na sir pura app to jaisa aap usko mark karenge waise hi leads aapko dega.
Customer: To aap to isko waise to band kar sakte ho to apni taraf se. Nahi sir hamari taraf se ye possible nahi hai warna hum IndiaMART ko to band kar sakte ho to.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: IndiaMART ko to band kar sakte ho.
Executive: IndiaMART ko band kar sakta hu matlab aapki taraf se IndiaMART to band ho sakta hai na hamara.
Executive: Sir mujhe to nahi samajh aa raha aap kya kehna chah rahe hain kyunki aapko hi karna padega aapko jo issues aa rahe hain aap mujhe WhatsApp pe message call kuch bhi kar sakte hain sir lead de dijiye kuch bhi de dijiye to main kar sakta hu itna try main kar sakta hu. Main aapko guide bhi kar sakta hu. Thik hai main dal deta hu. Thik hai main dal deta hu request aapki. Okay. Haan. Okay. Us call ko na aap mat uthana Shyam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving leads, especially for marble statues.

- Receiving irrelevant leads from local areas.

- Wants to block local leads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to share leads via WhatsApp.

- Executive explained how to mark leads as irrelevant.

- Executive offered to guide again on marking irrelevant leads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a link to view leads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, marble statue, irrelevant leads, local leads
